title: Identify the Numbers
text: The problem specifies there are two numbers.

title: Create Variables
text: Name the two unknown numbers x and y to represent those quantities. Let $$x=one$$ number and $$y=second$$ number.

title: Translate Into System
text: Since the sum of the two number is fifteen we can write $$x+y=15$$. Additionally one number is three less than the other so we can write $$x=y-3$$.

title: Solve the System
text: Using substitution we can substitute $$x=y-3$$ into $$x+y=15$$ to solve for y. $$x+y=15$$ $$y-3+y=15$$ $$2y-3=15$$ $$2y=18$$

title: Solving for x
text: Given $$y=9$$, plug the known value into one of the equations to solve for x. What is x?
